divs: Sighting Detailscame in formations,10-12 bright lights then broke apart and moved at high rate of speed two witnesses thousands of reports came in to local media and media urged people to stay calm as the sighting would not harm them local media was comfortable annoucing the sighting on tv and radio! LETS SEE IF they will broadcast the same way in the american continents. **(October 14th 2008 was believe it or not a day that had been predicted for a while to have contact or sightings to appear in the mid United states although this report came from (russia) Kazakhstan I am sure the reports will flood in from the U.S.A. this report was sent to me from a family member. SIGNED Andrew Alivisatos (UFO REASEARCHER) the truth is here!
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
